channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 70% OFF Labor Day Sale
item.description: Hi guys and gals, Penny stocks are red hot and it‚Äôs likely to continue in September as interest rates come down. Making now the perfect time to join Jason Bond Picks. Especially during the Labor Day Sale ‚Äî SAVE 70% with coupon code: SAVE70 Look at what all these hot penny stocks have in common. [‚Ä¶]

item.title: New report offers more details into Intel‚Äôs possible plans to slash costs, sell units
item.description: The board of Intel Corp. is expected to be presented with a plan later this month to slash capital spending and shed parts of its business, Reuters reported Sunday.

item.title: Trump debate prep: Tulsi Gabbard advises Republican to attack Harris on 'hypocrisy'
item.description: Donald Trump is set to debate Vice President Kamala Harris on Sept. 10, despite recent disputes over the previously agreed upon debate rules.

item.title: The peak interest rate era is over. Here's what investors are watching
item.description: The U.S. Federal Reserve is about to join the European Central Bank, the Bank of England, the People's Bank of China and others in cutting key rates.

item.title: ‚ÄòHe‚Äôs 70 and fairly wealthy‚Äô: I met the love of my life three years ago. How do I politely ask that he include me in his will?
item.description: ‚ÄúHis two sons are against any kind of commitment between us, as their dad has had two failed marriages.‚Äù

item.title: These 10 restaurant chains filed for bankruptcy this year
item.description: Chapter 11 filings have climbed 49% this year, according to BankruptcyWatch, and big-name restaurants such as Red Lobster and Buca di Beppo are among them.

item.title: Defense stocks in an ESG portfolio? A profound ‚Äî and controversial ‚Äî shift seems to be underway
item.description: The idea of including defense stocks in sustainably-minded portfolios remains controversial.

item.title: ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt want anyone telling me what to do‚Äô: My second husband wants to put our $750,000 home in a trust for his children. Does he have the right?
item.description: ‚ÄúAfter I retired I sold my home that we had been living in and it became part of my portfolio.‚Äù

item.title: Trump backs marijuana legalization in Florida if 'done correctly'
item.description: In a Truth Social post, the former president said he expects a ballot measure to legalize marijuana in Florida to pass.

item.title: Asia markets fall after China manufacturing slumps to 6-month low; real estate drags Hang Seng index
item.description: Among the economic data coming out from major markets in the region this week are inflation data from South Korea and Australia's second-quarter GDP data

item.title: ‚ÄòI was heartbroken‚Äô: My friend set up a $5,000 GoFundMe for veterinary bills after her cat died. I want to donate $200. Is it better to do so anonymously?
item.description: ‚ÄúShe tried desperately to save her companion, and the vet did everything they could but it was hopeless.‚Äù

item.title: Harris says Trump ‚Äòdisrespected sacred‚Äô Arlington for ‚Äòpolitical stunt‚Äô
item.description: Donald Trump has blamed President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris for the chaotic Afghanistan withdrawal, during which 13 U.S. soldiers were killed.

item.title: China urges EU to be 'objective and fair' on South China Sea issue
item.description: China urged the European Union to be "objective and fair" and careful with words and actions on South China Sea issues, after the bloc remarked on an incident.

item.title: The markets will rise or fall with NVDA

item.title: What‚Äôs worth streaming in September 2024: ‚ÄòSlow Horses,‚Äô ‚ÄòThe Penguin‚Äô and more
item.description: NFL returns to Peacock, Paramount+ and Prime Video, while Netflix rolls out big stars like Nicole Kidman, Kristen Bell and Will Ferrell

item.title: What's stalling China's stock market recovery, according to KraneShares' CIO
item.description: With investors fleeing Chinese stocks over growth concerns, the case for fiscal intervention could be stronger than ever.

item.title: BYD sales hit a record in August despite broader China EV slowdown
item.description: Chinese electric car giant BYD sold a record number of passenger vehicles in August, with sales of hybrids growing faster than those of battery-only cars.
